_source.short_desc: GiveGab is the #1 digital fundraising solution for Giving Days, year-round donations, crowdfunding for Higher Education institutions.
_source.long_desc: GiveGab is the #1 digital fundraising solution for Higher Education Institutions looking for modern and secure technology for Giving Days, Year-Round Fundraising, and Crowdfunding. Whatever your unique needs are, we have the solution! Fundraising professionals from colleges and universities choose GiveGab because our comprehensive donation features and customizations allow your school's brand to shine and make online fundraising easy, enjoyable, and effective.
_source.pricing_details: Custom Pricing: The GiveGab platform supports Giving Days of all sizes, varying from single organizations, large University systems, and everything in between. Our team will work with you to create a custom Giving Day package to meet your community's specific needs. Please schedule a demo to learn more.
_source.target_audience: Development, Advancement, and Marketing professionals in charge of fundraising campaigns for nonprofits, community foundations, higher education institutions, K-12 schools, or hospital foundations.

category_features.name: Fundraising Management
category_features.definition: Activities related to raising money for a specific cause

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

related_products.short_desc: Canvas LMS is a fully SaaS learning environment that streamlines interaction and builds strong relationships between teachers & student
related_products.features: Through open, scalable, SaaS technology, Canvas LMS enables easy integration of the content, tools, and services that educators want and learners love. As the most usable, customizable, adaptable, and reliable learning platform (with a 99.9% uptime), Canvas LMS is adopted faster and deeper (or, is used in more ways by more users) than any other LMS. And migrating to Canvas is faster and easier than you think.

related_products.short_desc: Free online learning management system, providing educators around the world with an open source solution for e-learning.
related_products.features: Improve your teaching and learner outcomes with Moodle LMS, the customisable open source learning management system used by over 300 million people in over 100 languages worldwide. Our feature-rich platform is secure and scalable, integrates seamlessly with third-party platforms and plugins, and allows teachers to create engaging, accessible and active learning experiences.

related_products.short_desc: OnBoard board intelligence platform simplifies complex board processes to make board meetings more effective. Start a free trial now!
related_products.features:
Board meetings should be informed, effective, and uncomplicated. 

The OnBoard board intelligence platform transforms complicated processes so boards can focus on what matters: Realizing their vision for the organization. Experience a board portal that makes decision-making easier with a system of record for directors, executives, and administrators and intuitive data and analytics on any device, in any place, at any time. 

Ready to start using OnBoard? Contact us for a free 30-day trial.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by HEIs around the world, Jotform Enterprise will help you prepare for the academic year, no matter what it may bring.
related_products.features:
Higher education institutions around the world use no-code solutions from Jotform Enterprise to save time, money, and IT resources. 

With a drag-and-drop form builder, industry-leading security, and robust integrations, educators can start building what they need in minutes. 

Schedule a call today to explore the power of Jotform Enterprise.

related_products.short_desc: Built for learning, our fully redesigned web conferencing solution allows employees to fulfill training requirements anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Focused on education and training, Blackboard Collaborate is designed for simplicity, accessibility and to support education and training workflows. Whether it's an online meeting, virtual group training, or connecting remote employees, our one-click virtual training solution offers a level of connection and engagement that makes learners forget that they're not in a physical space.

related_products.short_desc: Through our innovative technology and services, Blackboard helps organizations turn learning into a strategic advantage.
related_products.features: Blackboard is the largest learning company in the world. With over 100 million learners and 20 years of experience, we've perfected the art of effective learning. We've helped over 700 corporate and government organizations around the world deliver outcomes-based learning that drives employee growth in a measurable way. Our unified learning ecosystem of both technology and services provides a trusted one-stop solution that powers learning programs that make employees and organizations thrive.

related_products.short_desc: Apply empowers organizations to seamlessly collect, manage and review grant applications and drive better, faster funding decisions.
related_products.features: Move towards your mission, faster. Create a frictionless grantmaking process with SurveyMonkey Apply (formerly known as FluidReview). Seamlessly collect and review applications online, save time with robust automations, gain insights with powerful reports, and more. Special non-profit pricing is available.

related_products.short_desc: The Brightspace platform combines powerful tools that go beyond course management to let faculty teach the way they want.
related_products.features: Many institutions are frustrated by their LMS that forces a one-size-fits-all approach to learning and is difficult to use. The Brightspace platform combines powerful tools that go beyond basic course management to let faculty teach engaging courses the way they want - whether blended, fully online, or competency-based learning. The intuitive, mobile-friendly interface makes it easy for faculty and students to start using it on the laptops, tablets, and smartphones they use every day.

related_products.short_desc: ThankView is focused on building lasting relationships through personalized video on behalf of those who make the world a better place.
related_products.features: ThankView is focused on building lasting relationships through personalized video on behalf of those who make the world a better place. We're used by 1,000+ universities, nonprofits and health centers that seek to increase their engagement, learn more about their recipients through in-depth metrics and increase the overall financial impact of their outreach efforts. Whether you want to create sincere solicitations, spice up event invites or more individually thank donors, the ThankView platform

related_products.short_desc: A complete Higher Education CRM for student acquisition, application tracking, student journey tracking, enrolment, and more.
related_products.features: Automating admissions of several educational institutions globally, LeadSquared CRM is the complete admissions platform for student acquisition, application tracking, student journey tracking, enrolment, and more. Employ marketing communication automation across email, WhatsApp etc. Use self-serve forms, landing pages and email campaigns to collect student data easily. Create student portals with 360-degree student profiles, providing detailed reporting and analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 student-to-student marketing solution for student admissions, purpose-built for higher education.
similar_products.features:
Unibuddy is the #1 student-to-student marketing solution that helps recruiters build authentic connections and empowers prospective students to feel confident in their school choice.

It is quick and easy to set-up, simple to use for everyone, it seamlessly integrates with your CRM, and offers training and support for your team.

Join 500+ institutions that use Unibuddy and have successfully scaled their admissions efforts.

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based college management. It's secure and easy-to-use, with simple pricing, great customer support, and no upfront costs.
similar_products.features: Designed for higher education, Populi is web-based college management. It covers academics, admissions, online learning, student billing, financial aid, donations, contacts, library, bookstore, and more. Secure and intuitive, everyone at your school can use it. Our plain, simple pricing scales with your enrollment with no hidden fees or upfront costs. Every customer gets friendly, responsive customer support, together with implementation, data migration, training, and software updates.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based, AI-driven network security platform for schools.
similar_products.features: Lenovo NetFilter and Lenovo NetFilter+ are cloud-based and AI-driven, providing powerful, real-time protection for student devices in both onsite and remote learning environments. Using advanced artificial intelligence, Lenovo NetFilter provides real-time analysis of online content that is often missed by other filtering and security products. It not only keeps students safer, but with convenient mass deployment and customizable reports, full implementation is quick and easy.

similar_products.short_desc: Simple, Reliable, Classroom Management - remote, in person or hybrid. Windows, Chromebooks, Macs, iOS, Android & mixed OS environments.
similar_products.features: With LanSchool, teachers manage multiple activities in one central location, so they can focus on enabling learning instead of managing devices. Monitoring and protection features like thumbnail/fullscreen monitoring and web limiting help teachers keep student learning on track while communication and collaboration features like messaging and teacher/student screen broadcasting enable high quality learning. Our goal is to empower educators to deliver the best student outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Jetpack is a turnkey accreditation management platform with cutting-edge automation and intuitive workflows paramount for accreditors.
similar_products.features: Jetpack AMS is a cutting-edge platform built specifically for managing accreditation, assessment, and compliance by accrediting professionals. Whether you're an agency accrediting institutions or programs or an entity maintaining your accreditation, Jetpack has you covered. Jetpack is the only turnkey platform available that can be 100% configured to your accreditation workflow, giving you the power to retain your accreditation identity.

similar_products.short_desc: Echo360 is the leading interactive video learning management, content, engagement, and assessment platform for learners everywhere.
similar_products.features: Echo360 is the leading interactive video learning management, content, engagement, and assessment platform serving over 2 million learners across North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia Pacific.  Built for the cloud, instructors and learners around the world can use the platform from wherever they are, on any device, to create, record, and consume content, give and receive feedback, and gain real-time insights along their inspired learning journey.

similar_products.short_desc: Admissions marketing and enrollment CRM that connects students with colleges through personalized engagement and predictive analytics.
similar_products.features: Element451 helps college admissions teams identify, recruit, and convert more prospects into students. Machine learning lets you effectively reach your audiences with personalized messaging and imagery. Automation of tasks and communications lets you spend more time doing what you do best. And our friendly client-success team will make sure you always get support when you need it.

similar_products.short_desc: Blackbaud Award Management helps higher ed institutions transform their student awards programs and revolutionize stewardship practices
similar_products.features: Transform your institution's student awards program and revolutionize its donor stewardship practices with Blackbaud Award Management (formerly AcademicWorks). Built for higher education institutions of all types and sizes, this cloud-based solution serves as the catalyst to improve student access to awards and scholarship funds, create impactful stewardship practices, and enhance cross-functional visibility throughout the scholarship process. Learn more about Blackbaud Award Management.

similar_products.short_desc: Xplor Recreation is an all-in-one member management platform to help streamline operations & increase revenue.
similar_products.features:
What can you get for the daily cost of your cup of coffee? How about an all-in-one software solution that makes booking, billing, and buying a breeze for your members? 

Xplor Recreation manages all aspects of your business from members, activity registrations, online booking to registration, payments, and marketing. This powerful, easy-to-use member management software configures itself around your business and its people - not the other way around.

similar_products.short_desc: Complete web-based SIS for managing higher education, professional and career training.
similar_products.features: Orbund provides easy to use and powerful web based education management systems. Orbund SIS solutions are being used by a variety of higher education and career education providers. Our products' biggest strengths are flexibility, scalability, exceptional support and competitive pricing.

similar_products.short_desc: Trusted by HEIs around the world, Jotform Enterprise will help you prepare for the academic year, no matter what it may bring.
similar_products.features:
Higher education institutions around the world use no-code solutions from Jotform Enterprise to save time, money, and IT resources. 

With a drag-and-drop form builder, industry-leading security, and robust integrations, educators can start building what they need in minutes. 

Schedule a call today to explore the power of Jotform Enterprise.

similar_products.short_desc: Teams use Cartegraph software to manage every infrastructure asset, track work, optimize space, and make smart, data-driven decisions.
similar_products.features:
Government agencies, utilities, parks, and educational institutions tap into Cartegraph's asset management, work order management, and space management software to better manage their assets, track work, optimize space, and spend smarter. 

Cartegraph's easy-to-use solutions and mobile apps offer the most comprehensive, location-centric platform to manage every infrastructure asset: indoors, outdoors, above and below ground.

similar_products.short_desc: Web app builder with spreadsheet features. Powerful enterprise add-on that gets up and running quickly and remotely.
similar_products.features: Leverage the investment of your student information systems (SIS) with Intellimas, the solution with a grid UI that gets up and running quickly. It's set up to retrieve all necessary information, real time, to better manage admissions, student information, financial aid and more. Improve communications with students with automated processes and pinpoint information. Much more than a business intelligence tool, it allows for the creation of data not held in your SIS or other enterprise system.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Admissions software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Admissions tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Admissions software is used to manage student applications and automate enrollment processes for schools and universities. These solutions can also be used for managing admissions to membership-based programs, grants, and fellowships. Admissions software helps manage student records, streamlines communication between applicants and the admitting organization, and enables tracking of prospects generated through school or university marketing campaigns.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Classroom Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Classroom Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Classroom Management software creates, manages, and assesses class lesson plans and school curriculums for primary and secondary public or private schools. Teachers use these applications to create tests and lesson plans, manage attendance, enable online collaboration, monitor student activities, and manage documents via a convenient, integrated online interface. Classroom Management solutions allow easy contact from student to teacher, teacher to principal and principal to district school administration. Classroom Management software is related to Gradebook software and School Administration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Gradebook software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Gradebook tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Gradebook software automates grade tracking, performance assessment and monitoring of student attendance and provides easy access to synchronized data for teachers, principals and school administrators. Education professionals use Gradebook applications to aid in the development and evaluation of lesson plans and student assignments. They also provide features for assessing student performance along with integrated demographic data and state and federal guidelines. Gradebook software is related to Classroom Management software and School Administration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Grant Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Grant Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Grant Management software assists non-profit organizations with researching, applying for, collecting, and managing grants. It provides accounting capabilities specifically tailored to the needs of grant seeking institutions, as well as contact management and reporting features. For related software see Fundraising software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scholarship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scholarship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scholarship Management solutions help educational organizations with collecting and processing applications for financial assistance, as well as administering scholarship distribution.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Accounting software automates accounting, financial operations and other back office functions for educational institutions. These applications are specifically designed for the budgetary needs of school management and typically include tools for: accounting, billing, accounts payable, purchasing and payroll into a single administrative tool. School Accounting software is related to School Administration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

_source.short_desc: GiveGab is the #1 digital fundraising solution for Giving Days and year-round giving. Experience the JOY of fundraising with GiveGab!
_source.long_desc:
GiveGab is becoming Bonterra. Learn more at www.bonterratech.com.

GiveGab is the #1 digital solution for Giving Days and year-round fundraising tailored to nonprofit networks, community foundations, education institutions, hospital foundations, and public media outlets. GiveGab provides a modern and secure platform built on technology inspired by the feedback of our customers, resulting in products and features tailored to the most popular requests of our partners.
_source.pricing_details: Custom Pricing: The GiveGab platform supports Giving Days of all sizes, varying from single organizations, large University systems, and everything in between. Our team will work with you to create a custom Giving Day package to meet your community's specific needs. Please schedule a demo to learn more.
_source.target_audience: Development, Advancement, and Marketing professionals in charge of fundraising campaigns for nonprofits, community foundations, higher education institutions, K-12 schools, or hospital foundations.

media.caption: Hear it First From Our Partners: Join our successful Giving Day community where our advanced technology has a proven and unparalleled track record of year-over-year fundraising growth for our repeat Giving Days.
We make fundraising easy by providing an intuitive, attractive, and user-friendly online interface.

Hear it First From Our Partners: Join our successful Giving Day community where our advanced technology has a proven and unparalleled track record of year-over-year fundraising growth for our repeat Giving Days.
Our mission is to make it incredibly easy for you to be great at your job! We do this by giving you an easy, enjoyable, and effective digital fundraising experience you won't find anywhere else.

Giving Day Product: With our commitment to regular feature updates, live chat support, and access to peer-to-peer fundraising and matching technology, you can maximize awareness, engagement, and donations for your community, school, or organization.

related_products.short_desc: Bloomerang's donor management software helps fundraisers save more time, raise more funds, and do more good.
related_products.features:
Bloomerang helps nonprofits deliver a better giving experience so they can save time, raise more funds, and create lasting change. With our donor management software, you'll have access to: 

- Email Marketing Tools
- Letters & Mailings Templates
- An Integrations Hub
- Online Giving Pages & Forms
- Peer-to-Peer Fundraising Tools
- Reporting & Analytics
- Automatic Data Updates

related_products.short_desc: DonorPerfect empowers your team to work together, raise more money, and cultivate relationships that keep your mission moving forward.
related_products.features: Nonprofits raise 20% more funds in their first year using DonorPerfect. It's the most comprehensive solution in fundraising. Manage donations, contacts, receipting, reporting, email, and fundraising initiatives from a single system. With automatic monthly giving, integrated online donation forms, standard and custom reports, Constant Contact email, auction management, and a network of integrated partner solutions, DonorPerfect is ideal for organizations of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: With QuickBooks Online Advanced you can organize your books, complete tasks that matter faster with automated approvals and reminders, and stay on top of your cash flow. With the revenue streams dashboard, you can understand which fundraisers and donors are strongest and which need help. You can also create board-ready presentations intuitively. With 24/7 premium care, get the support you need.

related_products.short_desc: Church management software with membership, contributions, attendance, visitation, picture/portrait, and more.
related_products.features:
Too many programs make fund-raising complicated. Fund-raising should be fun, simple, and easily managed.  If people want to know where they are with their giving and how much they owe, this should be a simple thing to report.  Servant Keeper makes it so easy!

Join the 30,000+ non-profits that have discovered the secret to simplifying fund-raising while increasing donations.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of small nonprofits rely on Network for Good's simple and smart fundraising software to cultivate relationships with donors a
related_products.features:
Reach your fundraising goals, connect with supporters, and advance your mission with Network for Good's all-in-one fundraising software.

Built for small and growing nonprofits, only Network for Good is designed to help you become a better fundraiser.

Get donor management, powerful communication tools, online fundraising features, and more-all in one integrated software. Plus, our best-in-class onboarding, customer service, and data migration are always included.

related_products.short_desc: Neon CRM is the leading all-in-one fundraising & donation software on the market. Raise more and increase your organization's impact.
related_products.features:
Our fully-branded forms allow you to integrate any fundraising campaign seamlessly with your website at no additional cost. 

With Neon CRM, you can manage donors, campaigns, events, volunteers - your whole operation out of a single, unified software. Our relationship-focused approach to software ensures that your organization's personal touch is never lost - but time consuming manual work is.

Over 3,000 organizations are raising more with Neon CRM. Ready for a better fundraising tool?

related_products.short_desc: Auctria: a budget friendly web solution to run your entire event from tickets to receipts; traditional auctions or online fundraisers.
related_products.features: Auctria makes live, silent, online, virutal, hybrid auction & event fundraisers easy & affordable for groups large and small. Handle ticket sales, bids, purchases & donations. Track donors & items.  Produce printed forms as needed. Integrated credit card processing optional & accept online donations. Mobile and text-based bidding available. Completely transparent pricing with no performance fees. Explore our demo or get started with a free account to try it out.

related_products.short_desc: Fundraising solution that helps you communicate with your constituents and make better decisions.
related_products.features: Raisers Edge NXT is a smart, cloud fundraising solution built to help nonprofits achieve sustainable growth. It's a total solution that includes all the tools needed to be successful on one platform and one simple subscription price. This includes data enrichment services, event management, and social and email marketing tools, online donations, flexible reporting and actionable analytics.  Raisers Edge NXT pulls together your processes and people to move your entire mission forward.

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for charitable fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simplify every aspect of running your charitable event!  Sell tickets, Online, Mobile and paper-based bidding options. Manage contacts, track donations, create auction bundles and printed material.  Eliminate check-in / check-in lines, store credit cards, write thank you letters and more.  Simple, affordable and powerful event management software for any charitable organization including Schools, Churches, Community Service Organizations.  Night of your event support, video tutorials and more.

related_products.short_desc: Online donation platform & fundraising software for nonprofits. Includes donation forms, mass email, SMS, QB integration, and more.
related_products.features: Discover why thousands of nonprofits have trusted DonorSnap for over a decade. DonorSnap is an all-in-one fundraising software for nonprofits. Save countless administrative hours with time-saving tools and integrations. Take your fundraising to the next level with robust reporting and communication tools. Pricing starts at $39 per month. Try DonorSnap with your own data risk-free for 30 days.

similar_products.short_desc: EveryAction - a unified nonprofit CRM solution built to increase efficiency, optimize multichannel fundraising, & advance your mission.

With best-in-class fundraising, membership, advocacy and analytics tools built and supported by nonprofit experts, EveryAction enables organizations of all sizes to advance their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: GradAdvance by Graduway is the leading digital fundraising solution to manage giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns.
similar_products.features: GradAdvance by Graduway is a leading provider of digital fundraising solutions. Proven to be effective for giving days, crowdfunding, and annual campaigns, Graduway's full suite of tools enhance your efforts for more impactful outcomes, attracting more donors and raising more dollars.

similar_products.short_desc: Eleo is designed with new and seasoned fundraisers in mind.
similar_products.features:
Eleo is designed for new and seasoned fundraisers. Complete with every feature, integration, and report you need to build strong relationships with your donors. Send effective communications and analyze your fundraising efforts.  Eleo comes equipped with event, volunteer, membership and grant modules.

Pricing starts at $39/month for up to 2,500 contacts and includes live support, trainings, data import, & more.

similar_products.short_desc: Givebutter is a free fundraising platform bringing together everything changemakers need to successfully raise funds for good causes.

related_categories.description: Donation Management software helps nonprofit organizations collect, track, and distribute funds contributed by their patrons, maintain donors' information, and connect with them during fundraising campaigns. Payment processing capabilities as well as contact management features are essential parts of this software. For related software solutions see Fundraising software, Grant Management software and Payment Processing software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Fund Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. related_categories.description: Fund Accounting software automates accounting and portfolio management functions for nonprofit organizations, alternative asset managers, private bankers, foundations and government agencies. Fund administrators utilize these applications to assist in strategic decision making and to increase accountability across an organization's financial operations. Fund Accounting software also assists with regulatory compliance management and financial reporting on portfolio performance. Fund Accounting software is related to Accounting software and Government software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Political Campaign tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Political Campaign software provides financial and management tools, contribution tracking, a voter database, and other features to help political candidates and PACs more effectively manage campaigns. Campaign managers use these software applications to efficiently identify likely donors, target voters for outreach efforts, manage volunteers, track contributions, and assess the effectiveness of campaigns. Political Campaign software also typically offers demographic and voter behavior data, polling tools, call center integration and other campaign management necessities such as regulatory compliance monitoring. Political Campaign software is related to Fundraising software.
